Package net.sourceforge.openstego.util.dwt

Class Summary
DWT Class to handle Discrete Wavelet Transforms (DWT).
DWTUtil Class to handle Wavelet filters and other DWT utilities.
Filter Object to store Filter data
FilterGH Object to store FilterGH data
FilterXMLReader Class to read the Filters XML and generate corresponding Java Objects
Image Object to store Image data
ImageTree Object to store Image tree data
